content: small in size big in spirit knit the adorable charm-sized sweater and hat in your team s colors to share the joy of unity and support **finished measurements** hat approximately 4 / 10 cm around x 3½ / 9 cm high with unfolded hem not including pompom sweater approximately 3¼ / 8 5 cm across body x 2¾ / 7 cm high **yarn** berroco lanas light 100 g ***version 1 3 colors *** small amount each #7843 dark denim mc #7801 cream cc1 and #7850 berries cc2 for both hat and pullover ***version 2 2 colors *** small amount each #78145 shoal mc and #7821 sunny cc1 for both hat and pullover **needles** 1 set double-pointed needles or preferred needles for working small circumferences in the round size 4 / 3 5 mm *or size to obtain gauge* **notions** stitch markers waste yarn to hold stitches optional 1 / 2 5 cm pompom maker optional key clasp **gauge** 24 sts and 32 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in st st
